00040 TBTrackDbHandler::TBTrackDbHandler() : TBTrackBaseProcessor("TBTrackDbHandler") 
00041 {
00042   _description = "TBTrackDbHandler" ;
00043 }

00046 /****************************************************************************************************/
00047 /*                                                                                                  */
00048 /*                                                                                                  */
00049 /*                                                                                                  */
00050 /****************************************************************************************************/
00051 void TBTrackDbHandler::ProcessRunHeader(LCRunHeader *run) 
00052 {
00053   // Check there are runs constants
00054   if(!_runInformationValid) 
00055     {
00056       if(printLevel(-3)) 
00057         {
00058           cout << "No valid RunInformation" << endl;
00059           assert(false);
00060         }
00061     }
00062   
00063   // Print the run information
00064   _runInformation.print();
00065 }
00066 
00067 /****************************************************************************************************/
00068 /*                                                                                                  */
00069 /*                                                                                                  */
00070 /*                                                                                                  */
00071 /****************************************************************************************************/
00072 void TBTrackDbHandler::ProcessEvent(LCEvent *evt) 
00073 {
00074   if(_nEvt == 0) //first event
00075     {
00076       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " Accessing collections in first event" << endl;
00077 
00078       _runInformation.print();
00079       std::string location(_runInformation.location());
00080       float nominalBeamEnergy(0);
00081       
00082       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "location = " << location << endl;
00083       
00084       if (!_runInformation.isMC())
00085         {
00086           //mapConstants: not yet in the database (will they ever be ???)
00087           //but independant of run or E for now on.
00088           
00089           TBTrack::MapConstants mc(0);
00090           
00091           cout << "printing MapConstants" << endl;
00092           mc.print();
00093           
00094           LCCollectionVec* c0 = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00095           LCPayload<TBTrack::MapConstants> *p=new LCPayload<TBTrack::MapConstants>(mc);
00096           
00097           c0->addElement(p->output()) ;
00098           evt->addCollection(c0,"TBTrackMapConstants");
00099           
00100           delete p;
00101           if(printLevel(1)) mc.print();
00102           
00103           LCCollection *col1 = (lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler(location+"TBTrackAlnConstants"))->currentCollection();
00104           
00105           assert (col1->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00106           LCCollectionVec* c1=new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00107           
00108           LCPayload<TBTrack::AlnConstants> p1(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col1->getElementAt(0)));
00109           c1->addElement(p1.output()) ;
00110           
00111           evt->addCollection(c1,"TBTrackAlnConstants");
00112           
00113           if(printLevel(1)) (p1.constants()).print();
00114           
00115           // ----------------------------------
00116           // get the nominal beam energy from the run meta data
00117           // get the run metadata for real data - d jeans
00118           if (_beamMomentum>0)  // first priority: momentum from the steering
00119             {
00120               nominalBeamEnergy = _beamMomentum;
00121             } 
00122           else 
00123             {
00124               if (! lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler(location+"RunMetaData") ) 
00125                 {
00126                   cout << "cannot find " << location+"RunMetaData" << " database collection" << endl;
00127                   cout << " either add to steering file, or enter beam momentum explicitly via beamMomentum parameter" << endl;
00128                   // make it exit gracefully...
00129                   assert (lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler(location+"RunMetaData"));
00130                 } 
00131               else 
00132                 {
00133                   LCCollection *col99 = (lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler(location+"RunMetaData"))->currentCollection();
00134                   assert (col99->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00135                   CALICE::BeamMetaData metadata( (LCGenericObject*) col99->getElementAt(0));
00136                   cout << "run meta data (pdg, nominal momentum) = " << metadata.getPdgCode() << " " << metadata.getEnergy() << endl;
00137                   nominalBeamEnergy = metadata.getEnergy();
00138                 } 
00139             }
00140           
00141           streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Data collection added in first event" << endl;
00142           
00143           // ----------------------------------
00144           
00145         } 
00146       else 
00147         { //for MC only
00148           streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"for MC only: " << location << endl;
00149           
00150           //Fixme should be possible to switch between default and user defined folder
00151           LCCollection *col3 = (lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler(location+"TBTrackSimConstants"))->currentCollection();
00152           assert (col3->getNumberOfElements() == 1);
00153 
00154           LCCollectionVec* c3 = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00155           LCPayload<TBTrack::SimConstants> p3(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col3->getElementAt(0)));
00156           c3->addElement(p3.output()) ;
00157 
00158           //Fixme: See above ...
00159           evt->addCollection(c3,"TBTrackSimConstants");
00160           if(printLevel(1)) (p3.constants()).print();
00161           
00162           // need to decide how to get beam energy for MC
00163           // nominalBeamEnergy = ????
00164           // get it from the steering file
00165           nominalBeamEnergy = _beamMomentum;
00166           
00167           /* Don't do it this way
00168              LCCollection *col4 = (lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler("mcAlnConstants"))->currentCollection();
00169              assert (col4->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00170              LCPayload<TBTrack::AlnConstants> p4(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col4->getElementAt(0)));
00171           */
00172           /* Now get them from the SimConstants to ensure consistency
00173            */
00174           LCPayload<TBTrack::AlnConstants> p4(p3.payload());
00175           LCCollectionVec* c4 = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00176           c4->addElement(p4.output()) ;
00177           evt->addCollection(c4,"TBTrackAlnConstants");
00178           if(printLevel(1)) (p4.constants()).print();
00179           
00180         }//for MC only
00181       
00182       
00183       LCCollection *col7 = (lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler(location+"TBTrackFitConstants"))->currentCollection();
00184       assert (col7->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00185       LCCollectionVec* c7 = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00186       
00187       LCPayload<TBTrack::FitConstants> p7(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(col7->getElementAt(0)));
00188       
00189       // update the nominal beam energy
00190       TBTrack::FitConstants bebe = p7.constants();
00191       
00192       
00193       if(printLevel(1)) 
00194         {
00195           cout << "fit constants before momentum scale: " << endl;
00196           bebe.print();
00197         }
00198       
00199       cout << "beam momentum for tracking scatter matrix scaling: " << nominalBeamEnergy << endl;
00200       
00201       assert ( nominalBeamEnergy>0 );
00202       
00203       bebe.pBeamScale(nominalBeamEnergy);
00204       
00205       LCPayload<TBTrack::FitConstants> p7a( bebe );
00206       
00207       c7->addElement(p7a.output()) ;
00208       evt->addCollection(c7,"TBTrackFitConstants");
00209 
00210       if(printLevel(1)) 
00211         {
00212           cout << "fit constants after momentum scale" << endl;
00213           (p7a.constants()).print();
00214         }
00215       
00216       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "end of first event DB stuff, added collections to event " << endl;
00217       
00218     }//first event 
00219   
00220 }//processEvt
